## Professional Summary
Production Engineer specializing in Operations & Logistics and an MBA candidate at University Canada West. 5+ years in the textile industry spanning production, operations, inventory control, quality, and analytics. Strong track record improving processes and translating data into operational decisions using Excel and Power BI.
